amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS program by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the funding for the HOPA program by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Nadler.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
